The goal of vdjmisc is to provide some tools for the analysis of immune repertoires.

## Installation

You can install the release version of vdjmisc from [Github](https://github.com/ddiez/vdjmisc) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ddiez/vdjmisc")
```
